channel.title: Error when running server
channel.description: Whenever I try to run my server I get the error: [code=cpp]Picked up _JAVA_OPTIONS: -Xmx512M [2/16/14 2:44 PM]: Launching RevX Coded And created By Dillon [2/16/14 2:44 PM]: Exception in thread "main" [2/16/14 2:44 PM]: java.net.BindEx ception: Address already in use: bind [2/16/14 2:44 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind0(Native Method) [2/16/14 2:44 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Net.java:444) [2/16/14 2:44 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Net.java:436) [2/16/14 2:44 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(ServerSocketC hannelImpl.java:214) [2/16/14 2:44 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(ServerSocketAdapt or.java:74) [2/16/14 2:44 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.r egisterNew(SocketAcceptor.java:363) [2/16/14 2:44 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.a ccess$800(SocketAcceptor.java:55) [2/16/14 2:44 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor$W orker.run(SocketAcceptor.java:222) [2/16/14 2:44 PM]: at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.run(NameP reservingRunnable.java:51) [2/16/14 2:44 PM]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:744) [/code] This happened after I uninstalled a newer version of Java, then downloaded an older version to run my server more easily. Help?

item.title: Error when running server
item.dc:creator: @gwinter gwinter
item.description:
@gwinter wrote:

facepalms completely through head I completely forgot I downloaded Utorrent, thanks! Lmfao :palm:

item.title: Error when running server
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Itâ€™s trying to tell you that the port is already in use. Maybe you have something like uTorrent using that port?

gwinter:

This happened after I uninstalled a newer version of Java, then downloaded an older version to run my server more easily.

lol :L

item.title: Error when running server
item.dc:creator: @gwinter gwinter
item.description:
@gwinter wrote:

Whenever I try to run my server I get the error:

Picked up _JAVA_OPTIONS: -Xmx512M [2/16/14 2:44 PM]: Launching RevX Coded And created By Dillon [2/16/14 2:44 PM]: Exception in thread "main" [2/16/14 2:44 PM]: java.net.BindEx ception: Address already in use: bind [2/16/14 2:44 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind0(Native Method) [2/16/14 2:44 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Net.java:444) [2/16/14 2:44 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Net.java:436) [2/16/14 2:44 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(ServerSocketC hannelImpl.java:214) [2/16/14 2:44 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(ServerSocketAdapt or.java:74) [2/16/14 2:44 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.r egisterNew(SocketAcceptor.java:363) [2/16/14 2:44 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.a ccess$800(SocketAcceptor.java:55) [2/16/14 2:44 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor$W orker.run(SocketAcceptor.java:222) [2/16/14 2:44 PM]: at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.run(NameP reservingRunnable.java:51) [2/16/14 2:44 PM]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:744)
This happened after I uninstalled a newer version of Java, then downloaded an older version to run my server more easily. Help?

Read full topic
